price: 191. Lui attribuent-ils donc des associés qui ne créent rien et qui sont eux-mêmes créés ?
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ayush'rikūna mā lā yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
